definition: A term used to describe a certain level of expectation or entitlement that an individual believes they deserve in a particular situation. It is commonly used to refer to someone's claim or demand for a certain right, benefit, or quality, often in relation to their personal needs, standards, or achievements.

examples.german: Ich habe hohe Ansprüche an mich selbst.
examples.english: I have high expectations of myself.

examples.german: Sie erhebt Anspruch auf den ersten Platz.
Er erfüllt alle Ansprüche für diese Position.
examples.english: He meets all the requirements for this position.

examples.german: Die Firma hat hohe Ansprüche an ihre Mitarbeiter.
examples.english: The company has high demands on its employees.

examples.german: Der Film erfüllt nicht meine Ansprüche.
examples.english: The movie doesn't meet my expectations.
